project_abstract.cdata: The Composite Agricultural Extension Project will (i) reorganize and strengthen agricultural extension services in the three project States, with the objective of achieving early and sustained improvements in agricultural production, particularly of foodgrains; and (ii) strengthen the Central Government's Directorate of Agricultural Extension in order to increase its ability to support State agricultural extension programs.
